$:/plugins/wikilabs/link-to-tabs/history.title: $:/plugins/wikilabs/link-to-tabs/history
$:/plugins/wikilabs/link-to-tabs/history.text:
V 3.0.0 - 2023-12-28

* The ''edit-tabs'' plugin will be ''deprecated'' and be replaced by link-to-tabs
* There are 2 new settings now
** Clicking a tab-link opens ''non-system'' tiddlers in edit mode
** Clicking a tab-link opens ''every existing'' tiddler in edit mode

* New "settings" tab in the plugin
* New "settings" tab in the ''$:/ControlPanel -> Settings -> WikiLabs'' tab

V 2.4.0 - 2023-12-28

* Update tabs-macro to TW v5.3.3

V 2.3.0 - 2023-07-17

* Updateto TW v5.3.0
* Tabs in ControlPanel -> Plugins -> Plugin Info area work now.
** Except the "contents" tab, since it's a "virtual" one.

V 2.2.0 - 2022-03-27

* update to TW v5.2.2
* ''Important'': Changed license to Attribution-NonCommercial-ShareAlike -- [[CC-BY-NC-SA|$:/plugins/wikilabs/link-to-tabs/license]]

V 2.1.0 - 2022-02-17

* New $:/core/macros/tabs
* much more hackable and added dynamic tabs
** tabs can have a `condition` field now.

V 2.0.1 - 2020-12-25

* update license

V 2.0.0 - 2020.12.05

* Update $:/core/macros/tabs to V5.1.23

V 1.1.1 - 2020.01.19

* Update license link/text

V 1.1.0 - 2019.07.14

* Add new option: Initially hide link
** Transition time from hidden to visible is adjustable
* Added: "Reset to Default" button

V 1.0.1 - 2019.02.18

* link-to-tabs works in drop-down elements now.

V 1.0.0 - 2019.02.14

* Use core tabs-macro from TW 5.1.19

V <1.0.0

* Use core tabs-macro from TW 5.1.15

$:/plugins/wikilabs/link-to-tabs/setting.title: $:/plugins/wikilabs/link-to-tabs/settings
$:/plugins/wikilabs/link-to-tabs/setting.caption: Link-to-Tabs
$:/plugins/wikilabs/link-to-tabs/setting.text:
The full documentation can be found at [[links-to-tabs plugin|https://wikilabs.github.io/editions/link-to-tabs/]] main page. <$checkbox tiddler="$:/plugins/wikilabs/link-to-tabs/config" field="show-all-links" checked="inline-block" unchecked="none" default="none"> Show internal tab link for ''all tabs'' <$checkbox tiddler="$:/plugins/wikilabs/link-to-tabs/config" field="show-single-link" checked="inline-block" unchecked="none" default="inline-block"> Show internal tab link for ''selected tabs'' <$checkbox tiddler="$:/plugins/wikilabs/link-to-tabs/config" field="initial-opacity" checked="0" unchecked="0.7" default="0.7"> Tab links are initially hidden and need mouse hover to become visible.
The transition time in seconds is: <$edit-text tiddler="$:/plugins/wikilabs/link-to-tabs/config" field="transition" default="0.3"/> <$checkbox tiddler="$:/plugins/wikilabs/link-to-tabs/config" field="link-action" checked="tm-edit-tiddler" unchecked="tm-navigate" default="tm-navigate"> Clicking a tab-link opens ''non-shadow'' tiddlers in ''edit mode'' <$checkbox tiddler="$:/plugins/wikilabs/link-to-tabs/config" field="shadow-action" checked="tm-edit-tiddler" unchecked="tm-navigate" default="tm-navigate"> Clicking a tab-link opens ''every existing'' tiddler in ''edit mode'' <$button message="tm-delete-tiddler" param="$:/plugins/wikilabs/link-to-tabs/config"> Reset to Default!

$:/plugins/wikilabs/link-to-tabs/styles.title: $:/plugins/wikilabs/link-to-tabs/styles
$:/plugins/wikilabs/link-to-tabs/styles.text:
.wltc-link-to-tab {
  display: {{$:/plugins/wikilabs/link-to-tabs/config!!show-all-links}};
  position: relative;
  top: -1em;
  left: -1.3em;
  font-size: 0.7em;
  opacity: {{$:/plugins/wikilabs/link-to-tabs/config!!initial-opacity}};
  margin-right: -1em;
}

.wltc-link-to-tab svg{
  width: 1.4em;
  height: 1.4em;
}

.wltc-link-to-tab:hover {
  opacity: 1;
  transition:opacity {{$:/plugins/wikilabs/link-to-tabs/config!!transition}}s;
  transition-timing-function: cubic-bezier(1,-0.06,.39,.89);
}

.tc-tab-selected + .wltc-link-to-tab {
  display: {{$:/plugins/wikilabs/link-to-tabs/config!!show-single-link}};
}

.tc-vertical > .wltc-link-to-tab {
  top: -1.9em;
  left: 0;
  height: 0;
  float: right;
}

.tc-search-results .wltc-link-to-tab a {
  display: contents;
  padding: 0;
}
